lyric:
[00:08]I will run, I will climb, I will soar
[00:13]I’m undefeated
[00:16]Jumping out of my skin, pull the chord
[00:21]Yeah I believe it
[00:23]The past, is everything we were don’t make us who we are
[00:26]So I’ll dream, until I make it real, and all I see is stars
[00:37]Its not until you fall that you fly
[00:43]When your dreams come alive you’re unstoppable
[00:47]Take a shot, chase the sun, find the beautiful
[00:51]We will glow in the dark turning dust to gold
[00:55]And we’ll dream it possible
[01:16]I will chase, I will reach, I will fly
[01:20]Until I’m breaking, until I’m breaking
[01:24]Out of my cage, like a bird in the night
[01:28]I know I’m changing, I know I’m changing
[01:31]In, into something big, better than before
[01:39]And if it takes, takes a thousand lives
[01:43]Then It’s worth fighting for
[01:46]Its not until you fall that you fly
[01:50]When your dreams come alive you’re unstoppable
[01:55]Take a shot, chase the sun, find the beautiful
[01:59]We will glow in the dark turning dust to gold
[02:03]And we’ll dream it possible
[02:23]From the bottom to the top
[02:26]We’re sparking wild fire’s
[02:28]Never quit and never stop
[02:30]The rest of our lives
[02:32]From the bottom to the top
[02:34]We’re sparking wild fire’s
[02:36]Never quit and never stop
[02:39]Its not until you fall that you fly
[02:45]When your dreams come alive you’re unstoppable
[02:49]Take a shot, chase the sun, find the beautiful
[02:53]We will glow in the dark turning dust to gold
[02:57]And we’ll dream it possible possible
tlyric:
[00:08]我奔跑，我攀爬，我会飞翔
[00:13]永不言败
[00:16]跳出我的皮肤，拨弄琴弦
[00:21]哦，我相信。
[00:23]往昔，逝去的光阴不会决定现在
[00:26]所以我们梦想，直到变成真，看到满天星光
[00:37]不怕跌倒，所以飞翔
[00:43]当你的梦想成真，你是不可阻挡
[00:47]挥着翅膀，追逐太阳，寻找美丽
[00:51]在黑暗中闪耀点石成金
[00:55]我们会梦想成真
[01:16]我追逐，我奔驰，我要飞翔
[01:20]直到坠落，直到崩溃
[01:24]走出我的囚笼，像在黑夜里的莺
[01:28]我知道我在变化，在蜕变
[01:31]变成无比强大，从未有过
[01:39]如果需要牺牲，需要无数的生命
[01:43]那值得去奋斗
[01:46]不怕跌倒，所以飞翔
[01:50]当你的梦想成真，你是不可阻挡
[01:55]挥着翅膀，追逐太阳，寻找美丽
[01:59]在黑暗中闪耀点石成金
[02:03]我们会梦想成真
[02:23]从山谷到巅峰
[02:26]我们正在迸发野火
[02:28]永不放弃，永不停止
[02:30]点燃未来
[02:32]从山谷到巅峰
[02:34]我们正在迸发野火
[02:36]永不放弃，永不停止
[02:39]不怕跌倒，所以飞翔
[02:45]当你的梦想成真，你是不可阻挡
[02:49]挥着翅膀，追逐太阳，寻找美
[02:53]在黑暗中闪耀点石成金
[02:57]我们会梦想成真
